S10tbimbk_u:1_3_0: tataḥ suvarṇaprabho [Tbks_2r2] saparivāra bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya śirasā praṇamya
S10tbimbk_u:1_3_1: bhagavato 'ntikaṃ niṣaṇṇa dharmaśravaṇārtham* atha [Tbks_2r3] bhagavāṃ sarvasatvānusaṃśayaṃ
S10tbimbk_u:1_3_2: jñātvā tebhyo mahājanakāyebhya dharmaśrāvaṇikebhyaḥ tasya suvarṇaprabhasya rājakumārasya
S10tbimbk_u:1_4: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyaṃjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇam* [Tbks_2r6] pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ prakāśayati sma :
S10tbimbk_u:1_5_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ atīte 'dhvani ekanavatime kalpe [Tbks_2r7] vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho
S10tbimbk_u:1_5_1: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannas sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiś śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ
S10tbimbk_u:1_7: tad eka puruṣo [Tbks_2v2] bhikṣavaḥ paruṣadaridrakṛṣikarmaṇāvaprativṛtti bhagavatā vipaśyina śāsanebhiḥ prasannāḥ bhagavato vipaśyinaḥ [Tbks_2v3] pratimāṃ kartā
S10tbimbk_u:1_8_0: tasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ samaye sa evāyaṃ suvarṇaprabho rājakumāra yad bhagavato vipaśyinaḥ
S10tbimbk_u:1_8_2: anubhūtavān* ayaṃ sa suvarṇaprabho [Tbks_2rv5] rājakumāra samāsato bhikṣava sarvāsu
S10tbimbk_u:1_11: adhīśvarādhipati / śatasahasrakṛtvā [Tbks_3r1] caturdvīpeśvaro rājā cakravartī babhūvu /
S10tbimbk_u:1_13: [Tbks_3r2] sa kāmāvacareṣu devanikāyeṣu svargeṣu ekaikaśaḥ śatasahasrakṛtvā bhikṣava devānām indro rājā babhūva :
S10tbimbk_u:1_14: [Tbks_3r2] evaṃvidha : śatasahasrakṛtvā daśa brahmakāyikeṣu brahmādhipatir babhūvu:
S10tbimbk_u:1_18: [Tbks_3r6] suvarṇaprabho rājakumāraḥ antike devamanuṣyāṇāṃ acyutaṃ ajaraṃ amaraṇaṃ śivaṃ śāntaṃ padaṃ labhiṣyatīti /
S10tbimbk_u:1_19_1: anuśṛṇutā mānuṣyajātiṣu yeṣu [Tbks_3v1] ātmahitaparahitakāmena nāma bhikṣava buddhapratimā
S10tbimbk_u:1_20: tadyathā bhikṣava : mṛnmayī vā / [Tbks_3v2] śailamayī vā / dantamayī vā / dārumayī vā / suvarṇamayī vā / kaṃsamayī vā / tra...mayī vā / rupyamayī [Tbks_3v3] vā sphaṭikamayī vā /
S10tbimbk_u:1_21: maṇiratnakamayī vā / rītamayī vā / buddhapratimā karaṇīyakā vā /
S10tbimbk_u:1_23: snāpayitvā pūjayitvā yasya kasyacid bhikṣavaḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā buddhapratimāpuṇyaphalaniṣyanda :
S10tbimbk_u:1_25: punar aparaṃ bhikṣava: [Tbks_3v7] yaḥ kaścid bhikṣur vā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā /
S10tbimbk_u:1_26: kṣatriyo vā brāhmaṇo vā / vaiśyo vā / śūdro vā evaṃrūpāsu [Tbks_4r1] jātiṣu /
S10tbimbk_u:1_27: śrutidharo bhavati / jātismaro bhavati / svajanaparijanadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaprabhṛtiṣu sa ādeyavādyo bhavati /
S10tbimbk_u:1_32: yasya yatrābhikāṃkṣati / tatra tatra etaṃ labhati / rāgadveṣamoherṣyāmātsaryalobhatṛṣṇādikleśādibhi/
S10tbimbk_u:1_35: kṣipraṃ ca parinirvāṇaṃ śāntam adhigacchatīti vadāmi bhikṣavaḥ [Tbks_4r5]
S10tbimbk_u:1_38: parinirvṛto 'pi adhigato nāpi buddho bhagavāṃ parinirvṛta iva buddhapratimāyā darśanād iti vadāmi bhikṣava idam avocad bhagavāṃ [Tbks_4r7] tathāparaṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
S10tbimbk_u:1_39: kṛtvā purā kāśyapabiṃbam agryaṃ gandhodakai snāpitavāṃ dvijendraḥ /
S10tbimbk_u:1_40: [Tbks_4v1]puṣpai sugandhais sumanojñagandhai tenaiva puṇyena bhavād vimuktaḥ 1
S10tbimbk_u:1_41: yaṃ nirmalaḥ kleśamalair vimukta cittasya citteśvaratāgatiṃ syaḥ
S10tbimbk_u:1_42: rūpaṃ na tṛptāś ca nirīkṣya matvā tadbiṃba saṃsnāpayato jinasya 2 [Tbks_4v2]
S10tbimbk_u:1_44: labhanti nāryaḥ puruṣāś ca loke tadbiṃba saṃsnāpayato jinasya 3 [Tbks_4v3]
S10tbimbk_u:1_46: śāntaṃ padaṃ yānti narā striyo vā tadbiṃba saṃsnāpayato jinasya 4 [Tbks_4v4]
S10tbimbk_u:1_47: tyaktvā kaḍevaram ihaiva narā striyo vā
S10tbimbk_u:1_50: viśvasya tat phalam udāram uvāca buddhaḥ 5
S10tbimbk_u:1_55: yāvantaḥ paramāṇavo bhagavata stūpeṣu biṃbasya vā / [Tbks_4v7]
S10tbimbk_u:1_56: tat kartum* divi bhūtale ca niyataṃ tāvanti rājyāni te /
S10tbimbk_u:1_57: buddhānāṃ khalu dhātave bhagavatā śarīrā ni ca nirmitā / [Tbks_5r1]
S10tbimbk_u:1_60: ye martyāḥ kārayitvā pramuditamanasā pūjayante yathāvat [Tbks_5r2]
S10tbimbk_u:1_61: svarge saktye ca rūpaṃ nayanaratikaraṃ śuddhacāmīkarābham*
S10tbimbk_u:1_62: te labdhāś śāntikāmā sukham idam atulaṃ prāpnuvanty āvajuṣṭaṃ // 8 [Tbks_5r3]
S10tbimbk_u:1_63_0: ity evādiprakārāṃ suvarṇaprabhavasuyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā paṃcaśatasahasra [Tbks_5r4]
S10tbimbk_u:1_63_2: [Tbks_5r5] sarvaṃ gārhasthyam apahāya tathaiva śāsane pravrajita
S10tbimbk_u:1_64_0: yoniśa sa manaskāraṃ kṛtvā sarvakleśaprahāṇā arhatvaṃ strīparivārās [Tbks_5r6] samaloṣṭakāṃcana
S10tbimbk_u:1_64_1: samacittāḥ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyā apahṛtabhārāḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojana vimuktās saṃsārabandhanās
S10tbimbk_u:1_66: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandam* bhikṣavaś caturdiśasaṃkhyārhatvaṃ babhūvu /
